載.definition: to carry; to convey; to load; to hold; to fill up; and; also; as well as; simultaneously

載人.definition: to carry a passenger; (of spaceships etc) manned; also pr. [zai3 ren2]

載人軌道空間站.pinyin: zai4 ren2 gui3 dao4 kong1 jian1 zhan4

載入.definition: to load into; to record; to write into; to enter (data); to go into (the records); to go down (in history)

載入史冊.definition: to be recorded in history; to go down in history

載具.definition: conveyance (car, boat, aircraft etc); vehicle; (fig.) medium; platform; vector; (Tw) (Taiwan pr. [zai3 ju4]) a consumer's device (smart card or mobile app barcode etc) that can be scanned at checkout to save the receipt 統一發票|统一发票[tong3 yi1 fa1 piao4] to a cloud account

載明.definition: to state explicitly in writing; to specify; to stipulate

載湉.definition: birth name of Qing emperor Guangxu 光緒|光绪[Guang1 xu4]

載漪.definition: Zai Yi (1856-1922), Manchu imperial prince and politician, disgraced after supporting the Boxers

載舟覆舟.definition: to carry a boat or to overturn a boat (idiom); fig. The people can support a regime or overturn it.

載車.definition: onboard (equipment); to ferry cars; missile trucks

載途.definition: to cover the road (snow, wind, hazards etc); distance (between locations)

載道.definition: to fill the road (also fig. clamor, cries of complaint); to communicate a moral; to convey the Way; to express (idea, preference, complaint)

載重量.definition: dead weight; weight capacity of a vehicle
